technology.name: Metallurgy
technology.ShortDescription: The metals that populate your world.
technology.ResearchedDescription:
The world is full of many interesting things. Animals roam the fields, monsters rule the night, and eldritch energies course throughout the land. Perhaps most beneficial to you, however, are the various ores that inhabit the ground. Iron and coal are plentiful, but you know both are merely the tip of the iceberg when it comes to structural integrity and fuel.
Titanium
This silvery metal quickly corrodes when exposed to air, resulting in a dark oxidation on its surface. It is most commonly found at depths of 40 to 0. It has extremely high durability, making it suitable for encasing mechanisms and circuitry. You theorize that you can also temper this metal by running it under intense heat for extra durability.
Platinum
A rare, shiny metal, renowned for its resistance to corrosion. Most commonly found between depths of 30 and 0, it is useful for electronics where exposure to hostile chemicals is a certainty.
Thorium
A heavy metal, with uses in nuclear decay chains. Found in depths of 50 to 0, it's only truly useful once you figure out how to harness the power of its nuclear decay.

technology.name: Basic Circuits
technology.ResearchedDescription: Machines and mechanisms are worthless heaps of metal unless there is a purpose behind them. You have deduced a simple set of logical mechanisms and a simple means of producing them.__Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:item.ItemConductivePowder--This powder balances the volatility of farenite with the stability of lapis, making it useful for conduction.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:item.ItemBoard--A simple assembly of sticks, side-by-side, gives a base for mounting logic assemblies.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:item.ItemPrimedBoard--Some conductive powder on the board, when run through an oven, creates a foundation for circuitry.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:item.ItemSpool--Just a thin rod of wood with end caps, it makes an excellent storage unit for wires.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:item.ItemSpoolGold--Your studies show gold is an excellent conductor, and you plan on using nothing but the highest quality for your machines.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:item.ItemSpoolPlatinum--Some thin platinum wire on a spool. Useful for corrosive environments.____Recipe.Crafting:Femtocraft:item.ItemMicrochip--Thin wiring on a solid board, these multipurpose devices enable your machines to perform basic logic.__

technology.name: Scientific Theory
technology.ResearchedDescription: What is a scientist without the scientific method? Luckily for you, you no longer have to experiment. This handy Research Computer analyzes all of your knowledge and will theorize prototypes for you to make. Stick these prototypes into the Research Console to have it analyze the potential uses and to store the standardized blueprints into your knowledge store. __Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:tile.BlockResearchComputer--Allows visual access to your personalized knowledge store.____Recipe.Assembler:Femtocraft:tile.BlockResearchConsole--Analyzes your prototypes and generates standardized blueprints.__

technology.name: VacuumTube Hub
technology.ShortDescription: A place for nothing to congregate.

technology.name: Basic Chemistry
technology.ResearchedDescription: Inspecting the materials around you leads you to the conclusion that several of these materials share similarities with each other. Long nights of study and experiments have shown that, in fact, these objects are created out of complex combinations of several, smaller technology.name: Spacetime Manipulation
technology.ShortDescription: The question is: When did you ACTUALLY finish researching this?

technology.name: Temporal Pipelining
technology.ShortDescription: Start working on the next second, before it begins.

technology.name: Temporal Threading
technology.ShortDescription: Having multiple timelines do work at once.

technology.name: Causality Singularity
technology.ShortDescription: If you researched this, you never would have researched this.
